arts.ttl: Messi at the double as Inter Miami maul Montreal
arts.sum: Tadeo Allende finally found a way past Sirois, making it 1-1 on 33 minutes, courtesy of a brilliant assist from Messi. But Mascherano’s men were forced to come from behind after Montréal opened the scoring just two minutes into the game - sparked by an uncharacteristic mistake from Lionel Messi.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami 4–1 CF Montreal: Lionel Messi Matches Thierry Henry Record in Dominant Win
arts.sum: It was not a performance without its faults for Javier Mascherano’s side on their return from the Club World Cup.

arts.ttl: Lionel Messi Has a Rare Poor Moment for Inter Miami vs. CF Montreal in MLS Return
arts.sum: Inter Miami CF got off to a nightmare start against CF Montréal in their return to MLS action.

arts.ttl: CF Montreal vs. Inter Miami: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Javier Mascherano is hoping to pick up a big win on the road in Canada.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami Predicted Lineup vs. CF Montreal: Messi Tasked With Leading MLS Charge
arts.sum: The Herons need to launch themselves up the standings after the Club World Cup.
